title: emissions of a computers components
extract: RecyclingWhere possible, computer components such as monitors, speakers, RAM chips and hard drives should be re-used. ... Electronic devices contain precious materials including gold, silver and palladium. ... Electronic devices also contain highly toxic materials such as mercury, lead and arsenic.More items...
extract_html:
Recycling
  • Where possible, computer components such as monitors, speakers, RAM chips and hard drives should be re-used. ...
  • Electronic devices contain precious materials including gold, silver and palladium. ...
  • Electronic devices also contain highly toxic materials such as mercury, lead and arsenic.
More items...
